channel.title: briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Dems' divide over Harris surfaces as she looks like a 2028 contender
item.description: MEMPHIS, Tenn. — Many Democratic powerbrokers in D.C. are done with Kamala Harris . They see the former vice president as a politically toxic reminder...

item.title: Scoop: Musk shocks with $10 million donation in Ky. Senate race

item.title: Davos sneak peek: OpenAI warns of "capability overhang"
item.description: In Davos this week, OpenAI will unveil plans to help everyday users get as much out of ChatGPT as the most prolific AI adopters. Why it matters: ChatG...

item.title: The Civil Rights era is losing its grip on young Americans
item.description: The Civil Rights era is no longer the central reference point for how many young Americans understand race, justice and power — a generational shift r...

item.title: Where homes are most (and least) affordable

item.title: Trump administration backs labor secretary facing misconduct probe
item.description: The accusations have caught the attention of the business community in Washington, which supports the agency’s priorities under Lori Chavez-DeRemer.

item.title: Gov. Shapiro, in book, says Harris team asked him if he was ever Israeli agent
item.description: Shapiro was told that the question was part of the vetting process for vice president but he still found it offensive, he wrote in his upcoming memoir...

item.title: FBI opened probe on Minneapolis shooting; none exists now, Justice Dept. says
item.description: After the death of Renée Good in Minneapolis, FBI agents launched a civil rights probe into the shooting. The Justice Department says no such case now...

item.title: Americans give Trump low marks on handling of economy as midterms likely to center on affordability
item.description: Sixty-one percent of voters told a CNN poll released Friday that they disapprove of the way Trump is handling the economy.

item.title: Capitol agenda: Trump tests GOP with Fed probe
Vance tries to thread affordability needle in Rust Belt
item.description: The vice president fine-tunes Trump’s economic message, but he's only got so much wiggle room.

item.title: Ex-Trump voters swung hard to Democrats over costs in NJ & VA, new research shows

item.title: Democrats think they’ve found their 2026 message — and Miami just backed it up
item.description: In races across the country, Democrats focused on promises to make life more affordable — even as they offered contrasting approaches.

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
item.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model
item.description: DeepSeek is called “amazing and impressive” despite working with less-advanced chips.

item.description: DeepSeek, SoFi and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
